advancement.vanilla_hammers.root.title: Vanilla Hammers
advancement.vanilla_hammers.stone_hammer: Start with the basics and craft a Stone Hammer.
advancement.vanilla_hammers.slime_hammer: Craft a Slime Hammer... how about whacking something with it?
advancement.vanilla_hammers.lapis_hammer: It's a Diamond Hammer, not a Lapis Hammer!
advancement.vanilla_hammers.prismarine_h: Craft a Prismarine Hammer with the material of the seas.
advancement.vanilla_hammers.quartz_hamme: Begin your fiery conquest with a Quartz Hammer.
advancement.vanilla_hammers.golden_hamme: The Golden Hammer doesn't work well, but it sure does look cool!
advancement.vanilla_hammers.netherite_ha: Craft a Netherite Hammer, forged with ancient gems from an unknown time.
advancement.vanilla_hammers.emerald_hamm: Showcase your uniqueness with a Emerald Hammer.
advancement.vanilla_hammers.fiery_hammer: Finalize your descent with a Fiery Hammer.
advancement.vanilla_hammers.obsidian_ham: Craft an Obsidian Hammer and go mining for 17 hours without stopping.
advancement.vanilla_hammers.ender_hammer: Craft the Ender Hammer to end your mining woes.
